paper_abstract: S-boxes having large number of linearly independent multivariate biaffine or quadratic equations may be susceptible to certain kinds of algebraic attacks. In a 2009 IEEE-IT paper, Nawaz et al. provided a polynomial time algorithm to compute the number of such equations for finding S-boxes based on power mapping. Finding actual equations in polynomial time was still open. In this paper, techniques for finding a maximal set of linearly independent biaffine and quadratic equations are developed for S-boxes based on power mappings. Two algorithms to calculate the biaffine and quadratic equations for any (n, n) S-box based on power mapping are presented. The time complexity of both the algorithms is O(n(6)).
paper_title: Finding Biaffine and Quadratic Equations for S-Boxes Based on Power Mappings
